white.text: A one-star Uber driver named "Wife of Tarantula."
Luring my husband to the bedroom with a trail of ferret teeth and appearing on the bed in a ferret costume.

black.text: Hallmark has invented a new holiday. It's called "_ Day."
Happy Birthday! I love you. Here's _.
Honey, it's gonna take more than a shitty greeting card to make up for ten years of _.
Roses are red. Violets are blue. I am _ and so are you.
